price: 19. Est-ce que celui sur qui s’accomplira le verdict d’Allah (peut être guidé ?) Peux-tu donc sauver celui qui est plongé dans le Feu ?
arabic: أَفَمَنۡ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: afaman ḥaqqa ʿalayhi kalimatu al-ʿadhābi afa-anta tunqidhu man fī al-nāri
